name: Boy Williamson
title: Service is awesome
message:
I used Boat Stone Grenade for 2 months it's a Huge Clear Sound And Clear Bass such a Very Nice Product,
after all It's a Grenade I gifted to my mom and my mom love this product very well.
this price range Boat Stone Grenade it's a Excellent Product...

would like to say only one word excellent, this is a great product, there is nothing better than this at such a price, I am very happy to buy it. It is very beautiful to look at and also strong.
1. Bass- 4.5
2. Sound- 5
3. Battery- 4
4. Build- 5
5. Looks- 5 above
